General.Name: Wonpung Mulsan Co.Ltd
General.Description: Wonpung Mulsan Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells men fashion apparels in South Korea and internationally. It markets its products under the Kinloch Anderson, Kinloch by Kinloch Anderson, Kinloch2, and Boston Manor brand names. Wonpung Mulsan Co.,Ltd was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.
